StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: NextGen Consortium: iPSC Derived EC as Surrogates Using Pulmonary Hypertension as a Prototype Disease

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: Lung tissues from IPAH and control patients were provided by the Pulmonary Hypertension Breakthrough Initiative (PHBI), which is funded by the Cardiovascular Medicine Research and Education Fund (CMREF) and by NIH/NHLBI grant 5 R24 HL123767 (PI: M Geraci). The tissues were procured at the Transplant Procurement Centers at Allegheny Hospital (Pittsburgh), Baylor University, Stanford University, Vanderbilt University and the University of Alabama at Birmingham, and de-identified patient data were obtained via the Data Coordinating Center at the University of Michigan. Users of the data should cite the following publications and phs accession number: (1) Gu M, Shao N-Y, Silin Sa S, Li D, Termglinchan V, Ameen M, Karakikes I, Sosa G, Grubert F, Lee J, Cao A, Taylor S, Ma Y, Zhao Z, Chappell J, Hamid R, Austin ED, Gold JD, Wu JC, Snyder MP, Rabinovitch M. Patient-Specific iPSC-Derived Endothelial Cells Uncover Pathways that Protect Against Pulmonary Hypertension in BMPR2 Mutation Carriers. Cell Stem Cell. 2017 Apr 6;20(4):490-504. (PMID: 28017794; PMCID: PMC5500296) and (2) Sa S, Gu M, Chappell JC, Shao N-Y, Ameen M, Elliot KAT, Li D, Grubert F, Li CG, Taylor S, Cao A, Ma Y, Fong R, Nguyen L, Wu JC, Snyder MP, Rabinovitch M. Induced pluripotent Stem Cell Model of Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension Reveals Novel Gene Expression and Patient Specificity. Am J Respir Crit Care Med 2017 Apr 1;195(7):930-41. (PMID: 27779452; PMCID: PMC5387706). (3) The original data can be found in the NIH database of Genotypes and Phenotypes (dbGaP) under phs000998.
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution did not respond within six months)

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use
ConsentGroup.name: GRU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.
